attributes.additional_details:
To bring bring a sense fairness back to the imbalance of our society. 
Make something add value. Do not make profits from others by  paper dictation of investments.
attributes.background: Please replace the bankers bonus cap. In the current climate it is unfair to allow this sector of commerce to be awarded excessively for simply doing their job. ( basically paper profiteering with no product).

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the cap on bankers' bonuses are a matter for the Prudential Regulation Authority, which is part of the Bank of England and operationally independent of the Government and Parliament.

We could accept a petition calling for legislation to create a new cap on bonuses for people working in the financial sector.
